name: Sortify- Go Green
description:
As the dial points towards the trash bins, the player taps to target a bin and then garbage start to shuffle in the screen ,  tap the garbage to feed the  right trash bin.
Putting items in the correct bins, earns the player more points.
Although the fewer items shuffle on the first stage, there will be more types of garbage coming by as player advance with the level.

Try to sort them quickly and accurately, go get combos !
